select ah.*, s.supplier OrganName, p.Name HandsPersonName, a.Name AccountName from jsh_accounthead ah left join jsh_supplier s on ah.OrganId=s.id left join jsh_person p on ah.HandsPersonId=p.id left join jsh_account a on ah.AccountId=a.id where 1=1
and ah.BillNo like '%${billNo}%'
and ah.Type='${type}'
and ah.BillTime gt;= '%${beginTime}%'
and ah.BillTime lt;= '%${endTime}%'
order by ah.Id desc
limit #{offset},#{rows}

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM jsh_accounthead WHERE 1=1
and BillNo like '%${billNo}%'
and Type='${type}'
and BillTime gt;= '%${beginTime}%'
and BillTime lt;= '%${endTime}%'
select max(Id) as Id from jsh_accounthead
select sum(${modeName}) as allMoney from jsh_accounthead where Type='${type}' and OrganId =${supplierId} and BillTime <='${endTime}'
